sentences.english: She and Nancy roomed together at college.
sentences.chinese: 她和南希在大學裏合住一處。

sentences.english: Nancy was working in the administration, too, on education.
sentences.chinese: 南希也在政府裏從事教育方面的工作。

sentences.english: Nancy was all smiles when she saw Tom.
sentences.chinese: 南希一見湯姆就滿面笑容。

sentences.english: Ula:Don't be so depressed. Has Nancy come to see you?
sentences.chinese: 不要這麼沮喪。南希還沒來看你嗎？

sentences.english: Nancy and Tonya both work out at the same gym.
sentences.chinese: 南希和託尼亞在同一家健身房訓練。

sentences.english: Ok, Mrs Lee, I mean Nancy.
sentences.chinese: 好的，李夫人，我是說南希。

sentences.english: Do you know where Nacy was born?
sentences.chinese: 你知道南希出生在什麼地方嗎？

sentences.english: Perky little Nancy, prom queen sixty two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 消遙自在的小南希，62年前的舞會皇后。
“喬，別打趣了，”南希沒好氣地說。

sentences.english: Nancy hesitates for a few seconds and then takes off the rest of her clothes.
sentences.chinese: 託尼亞微笑着脫去其餘的健身服，她赤裸着看着南希。

sentences.english: Nancy and I had grown to love our chicken.
sentences.chinese: 不知不覺，南希和我都已愛上了我們的小雞。

sentences.english: What do you think of Nancy?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得南希這個人怎麼樣？

sentences.english: This is Nancy Wang from China.
sentences.chinese: 我是從中國來的王南希。

sentences.english: He had once asked Nancy's help in obtaining city-subsidized housing.
sentences.chinese: 爲了獲得市政當局補助的住房，他曾經求南希幫過忙。

sentences.english: In embarrassment he couldn't remember the reasons for visiting Nancy.
sentences.chinese: 尷尬之中，他記不起來拜訪南希的理由了。

sentences.english: He was also was pre-deceased by his sister, Nancy.
sentences.chinese: 他的妹妹南希也曾先於他而去。

definition: Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
